basic.description: This course explores the design process by solving specific design problems in video and sound, going from conceptualization to refinement and final implementation.
basic.subject: GRA
basic.title: Graphic Design III/Production

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ART 1000, ART 1201C, ART 1203, ART 1300C, ART 1602C and ART 2003C or ART 2204C.
